thread.section_title: Hotel de Londres Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Book it!
thread.title_full: Book it! - Review of Hotel de Londres Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Lisa G
title: Book it!
text: Great Location! This hotel was within a 10 minute walk of the Eiffel Tower. We had a double room which was very cozy, clean, and decorated nicely. The staff was friendly and could speak English which was helpful for us. There are many restaurants within walking distance including a wonderful Italian restaurant. I would definitely stay here again!
